notes.text: Nothing special Dino Control deck, used XZH instead of AMA to help deal with Burn decks.  SRH wasn't that useful, but I added it instead of Wall of D since that always gets played around. Only 2 Brachios and honeslty I don't know if this deck needs the 3rd, it might be better with just 2 and a Fossil Dig.  I used a slightly different variation of the deck to climb from Legend 1-3 (AMA, Second Chalice) and I used a basic AG deck to climb from Plat 1 to Legend 1.Nothing special Dino Control deck, used XZH instead of AMA to help deal with Burn decks.  SRH wasn't that useful, but I added it instead of Wall of D since that always gets played around. Only 2 Brachios and honeslty I don't know if this deck needs the 3rd, it might be better with just 2 and a Fossil Dig.  I used a slightly different variation of the deck to climb from Legend 1-3 (AMA, Second Chalice) and I used a basic AG deck to climb from Plat 1 to Legend 1.
